bot: Shlok Salunke is a B.Tech student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at SVKM's NMIMS University, expected to graduate in 2027. He is proficient in Python, C++, and various data analysis libraries such as Scikit-Learn, NumPy, and Pandas. Shlok has experience in web scraping, data visualization, and object-oriented programming. He is passionate about applying AI and machine learning to solve real-world problems and is a quick learner with a strong problem-solving aptitude. Shlok has completed several certifications, including AI Fundamentals, Data Analytics Essentials, and Web Scraping Basics. He has worked on projects like a Bakery Management System and a data science simulation for British Airways. Shlok is eager to gain practical experience through internships at dynamic startups and contribute to impactful projects. He is fluent in Hindi and Marathi, and has intermediate proficiency in English.
